definition: (idiom) not want to be outdone/not content to lag behind
(negative prefix)/not/no
surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
sweet/willing
empress/queen/(archaic) monarch/ruler
back/behind/rear/afterwards/after/later/post-
surname Hou
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]

sentences.english: For even if I cannot bear playing second fiddle patriotic ashes, and I am also patriotic.
sentences.chinese: 平生爱国不甘后人，即使把我烧成灰，我也是爱国的。

sentences.english: Wilson capped it by saying in his high soft voice.
sentences.chinese: 威尔逊更是不甘后人，他尖声尖气地说话。

definition: to be frugal
to know how to be economical (idiom)
every drop returns to the public good (idiom); not one penny is misused
to donate generously (idiom)
lit. almanac from years back (idiom)/obsolete practice/old-fashioned principle
to revere people of virtue and honor scholarship (idiom)
hardworking/diligent
has eyes but can't see (idiom); unable or unwilling to see the importance of sth/blind (to sth great)
to monopolize the limelight (idiom)/to get all the glory/to rank highest
lit. wind and rain darken the sky (idiom); fig. the situation looks grim
variant of 摩拳擦掌[mo1 quan2 ca1 zhang3]
Words of benevolence apply universally (idiom). Humanitarian expressions benefit all.
see 拈花惹草[nian1 hua1 re3 cao3]
Shangyi county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei
lit. the old man lost his horse, but it all turned out for the best (idiom)/fig. a blessing in disguise/it's an ill wind that blows nobody any good
to bear one's own responsibilities and not pass them to others (idiom)
